amendment.description: At the end of division C (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. Each amount made available by this division (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) is hereby reduced by 14 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 163 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to decrease spending for each amount available in Division C by 14 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 299 (Roll no. 389).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 299 (Roll no. 389).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Banks.
